name: Seasonal Flowers,     Focal Size
description: A full, organically styled arrangement of Northern California's freshest and most beautiful and fragrant flowers, greens, and other botanical textures in colors to complement the local landscape. If you're ordering for Thanksgiving, this year's arrangements will likely feature local valley oak, decorative grasses, fruits and berries, scabiosa, football mums, yarrow, oncidium orchids, and spray roses. Thanksgiving flowers will be delivered on Wednesday, 10/27/13, or call or email for other delivery options. For delivery in the City of Napa, be sure to include the recipient's name, address, phone number, preferred delivery date (subject to confirmation) and card message in the special instructions field when placing your order. Total includes 8% Napa sales tax and delivery in the City of Napa. Please note: This listing is for home or office delivery in the City of Napa, CA only. Delivery is scheduled based on availability, usually the Thursday following order placement. For delivery outside the City of Napa, please call 707-418-8615 or email info@themonkeyflowergroup.com for more information.

name: A Rainy Season of Flowers, Oxbow Pickup (8 bouquets)
description: Do you love flowers? Do you know someone who does? Then this holiday season, consider The Monkey Flower Group's fresh flower subscription for your gift and wish lists. The bimonthly bouquets, available for pickup at The Oxbow Public Market on the first and third Thursday of January, February, March, and April, will include delicate and old fashioned garden flowers such as daphne, jonquils, snowdrops, sweet peas, lilac, parrot tulips, garden roses, dogwood, and hellebores. More standard seasonal favorites such as hyacinth, ranunculus, freesia, and stock will also make appearances. Bouquets are designed in clear glass vases to be returned when you pick up your fresh bouquet. Please note: This listing is for pickup at Oxbow Public Market in Napa, CA, on the first and third Thursday of January, February, March, and April . Not only does subscribing save you $5 per bouquet for a total savings of $40 over the course of the season, the pickup day is a great opportunity to stock up on fantastic breads, cheeses, and vegetables from Hudson Ranch and other local producers. Total includes 8% Napa sales tax.

name: Flowers to Care
description: The Monkey Flower Group developed its Flowers to Care (FTC) service in response to requests to deliver arrangements outside the Bay Area. But as it turns out, Flowers to Care are a wonderful gift for anyone, no matter where they live. Here's how it works. When you order Flowers to Care, Jaime designs a small arrangement using whatever is local, fresh and beautiful. She then sends you an email containing a link to a hidden web page where you can view and download a professionally shot digital photo of the flowers. (See an example here). This photo makes a great desktop image, print, and conversation starter, and can be shared freely for personal use with as many "recipients" as you like- simply forward along the email. The actual fresh flower arrangement is delivered to Cope Family Center to be enjoyed by members of the community. In addition to benefiting local flower growers and sharing the joy of flowers, the petite size and simplified delivery of Flowers to Care allow the Monkey Flower Group to offer them at a lower price point than is available through conventional delivery. It's just another reason why Flowers to Care make a wonderful gift for any occasion, no matter how big or small.

name: Note Cards
description:
A collection of 6 5"x7" note cards, each featuring one of The Monkey Flower Group's favorite photos from all seasons of Northern California.

Professionally printed photos are mounted on cream folded note cards made from recycled 100% post consumer waste paper stock. Envelopes are sturdy, 100% recycled brown kraft. 

Cards are wrapped for protection and storage in a convenient, 100% recycled brown kraft package and tied with a natural fiber twine. It makes a pretty gift as is; no additional wrapping required!
